modName: Nobles Companions - Chest of Setvi - Noble Sword - Skyrim
summary:
Add a chest at Whiterun's Skyforge with a free whole set of Wolf/Companions armor inside.
Just a little mod I made for myself for all my news games.
Maybe it can help ; it's why a share it with you.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url][/size][/b][b][color=#efefef][size=4]

Add a chest at Whiterun's Skyforge with a free whole set of Wolf/Companions armor inside.
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#efefef][size=4]Just a little mod I made for myself for all my news games.
Maybe it can help ; it's why a share it with you.
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69418-0-1442053257.png[/img]
_____________________________________
On request, add a custom new Skyforge Steel Sword, the Noble Skyforge Steel Falmer Sword, who's craftable, upgradable (with just the Steel Smithing perk required) ; and you can enchant this sword.
This sword is a custom sword stats based, & the customs stats & infos are:
Damage: 16 (like the Daedric Mace),
Value: 1250 (like the Daedric Sword),
Weight: 9 (like the Iron Sword),
Craftable under: Steel,
Perks required: Steel Smithing perk,
Forge: Skyforge or any (?) ;
Name: Noble Skyforge Steel Falmer Sword.
Origin: This sword was crafted byÂ [/size][/color][/b][color=#efefef][size=4][b]Ysgramor and his 500 Companions, & was since forged & reforged to defeat the Falmer, again and again.
Author's Notes: I do my best to make this a little bit lore-friendly.
___________________________________________________[/b][/size][/color][/center][b][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/69418-1-1442053257.png[/img][/b]
